Articles.Content:
Yop !

Today i come with a Diesel version of my AMX serie . i use Fuel Cell Array to simulate a Diesel engine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If u run out of fuel you may no longer move but turret has it own power generator so you still can defend your position ( like a bunker )

Easy to drive , easy to shoot !

Use key (1) & (2) to Start/Stop Fuel Cell Array

You have 144l of LF/Ox Give you a good lifetime .

Here's the [stock] & the [bD-Armory] version :

![screenshot46.png?psid=1](https://iwoaaq-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y3pa79pbpq46vxuYkadjudthEsgM_mqZjtCuBWjqCoAiT9slR-B8IGKyCPNSur3SAKzs85fB4Rcte_ZBRgWWzYBNMTkyLFlx3ObJBdie5n_WPoRw39cPKDsFTrM1uSC-VlNexeLI0pYw88NbK_PbOCa0RBmv-k_R9BQquMRVZMwarE/screenshot46.png?psid=1)

Download [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123191-Stock-Craft-ZLM-s-World-AMX-S-D-Diesel?p=1973860&viewfull=1#post1973860) !
